name: Transfer list
description: A transfer list or shuttle enables the user to move one or more list items between lists.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to disable a component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to disable a component.

properties.name: listType
properties.label: List Type
properties.handlerDescription: This property allows you to select a list type of Basic or Enhanced.
properties.settingTooltip: This property allows you to select a list type of Basic or Enhanced.

properties.name: leftListTitle
properties.label: Left List Title
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to specify the title of the list to the left.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the title of the list to the left.

properties.name: rightListTitle
properties.label: Right List Title
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to specify the title of the list to the right.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the title of the list to the right.

properties.name: leftListItems
properties.label: Left List Items
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to add items to the list to the left.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add items to the list to the left.

properties.name: rightListItems
properties.label: Right List Items
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to add items to the list to the right.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add items to the list to the right.
